div.p: This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/fhir-directory-query/CodeSystem/EndpointConnectionTypeCS defines the following codes:

tr.td: Interact with a FHIR server interface using FHIR's RESTful interface using an operation other than messaging. For details on its version/capabilities you should connect the value in Endpoint.address and retrieve the FHIR CapabilityStatement.
Interact with a server using HTTP/REST but not FHIR. Should be used for web portals.

definition.value: Interact with a FHIR server interface using FHIR's RESTful interface using an operation other than messaging. For details on its version/capabilities you should connect the value in Endpoint.address and retrieve the FHIR CapabilityStatement.
Interact with a server using HTTP/REST but not FHIR. Should be used for web portals.
